SELECT devName as equip, SC_PART as part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, RESULT AS value, ID as id, std_value as standard, uploadResultTime as time, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE
(ROUTE_NAME='浓密机' OR ROUTE_NAME='厂前回水泵' OR ROUTE_NAME='空气压缩机组' OR ROUTE_NAME='回水岗' OR ROUTE_NAME='中心气站岗')
and ALTPID !=0 and alarm_flag='N' AND date(uploadResultTime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY COMPLETE_TM DESC
